==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|ち|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|承|sc=Jpan|tr=shō||agree to}} + {{m|ja|知|sc=Jpan|tr=chi||know}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうち}}

# [[consent]], [[agreement]]
# [[permission]]
# [[forgiveness]]
# [[knowledge]], [[understanding]]

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* [[不承知]] (''fushōchi''): dissent, disagreement
* [[先刻承知]] (''senkoku shōchi''): being already aware
* [[承知の助]], [[承知之助]] (''shōchi no suke''): OK, Sure, Yessir!
{{der-mid}}
* [[承知の幕]] (''shōchi no maku''): agreement
* [[承知尽く]] (''shōchizuku''): acting on mutual agreement
* [[百も承知]] (''hyaku mo shōchi''): knowing only too well
{{der-bottom}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|しょうち}}

# [[consent]] to, [[agree]] to
# [[permit]]
# [[forgive]]
# [[know]], [[understand]]
